duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead complex, multi-disciplinary CPU development projects from start to finish.
Facilitate efficient communication among CPU teams such as front-end design, design verification, physical design, and emulation.
Coordinate regular communication meetings at various levels and across multiple geographical locations.
Host issue triage and resolution meetings at the project level and track issues to satisfactory closure.
Ensure programs are executed at the best possible level for quality and schedule.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
